name: Soluna (ClaraEmily)
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Soluna! You, a young wizard, are given a  magical gift which allows you to switch daytime. 

Climb the tower by soving little puzzles on your way.

CONTROLS: (controller support)

Move - A + D / Left Stick 

Jump - Space Bar / Button South

Switch Daytime - E / Button West

PauseMenu - Escape / Start
